title: Easy Way to Fix Steam Overlay on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open Steam on your PC or Mac.
steps.content: Open Steam on your PC or Mac. It’s in the All Apps section of the Start menu in Windows, and the Applications folder in macOS.

steps.title: Click the View menu.
steps.content: Click the View menu. It’s at the top of Steam in Windows, and in the menu bar in macOS.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . It’s at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Click In-Game.
steps.content: Click In-Game . It’s in the left column.

steps.title: Check the box beside “Enable the Steam Overlay while in-game.”
steps.content: Check the box beside “Enable the Steam Overlay while in-game.” It’s the first check box in the window.

steps.title: Click OK.
steps.content: Click OK . The Steam Overlay is now ready to use.
